2025-09-24T01:05:00.CONTENT_EN: According to Hong Kong Observatory's prediction, storm surge will occur on 24 September early morning due to the effect of Super Typhoon Ragasa. The water level of Sha Tin Shing Mun River, Tai Po Lam Tsuen River and Tai Po River will rise and may exceed the river bank resulting in flooding at riverside areas' footpaths, cycle track and the nearby subways. Citizen shall avoid routing through flood-prone areas and stay away from watercourses.
2025-09-24T01:05:00.CONTENT_CN: 根據天文台的預測，因受超強颱風樺加沙影響，風暴潮預計於9月24日清晨出現。沙田城門河、大埔林村河及大埔河的水位有可能會超出河堤而引致河畔一帶行人路、單車徑及附近的隧道出現水浸。市民應遠離河道，並儘量避免途經有關地點。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Special traffic arrangement at Lok Ma Chau Control Point
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 落馬洲管制站特別交通安排

2025-09-25T20:00:00.CONTENT_EN:
Motorists are advised that, the number of cross-boundary private cars travelling to and from the Mainland via Lok Ma Chau Control Point may increase in the small hours of 28 and 29 September 2025. Subject to actual traffic condition, special traffic arrangement may be implemented at the approaches to the Lok Ma Chau Control Point during the period concerned to allow smooth access of all cross-boundary and domestic passenger service vehicles (including cross-boundary coaches and Yellow Bus) to the above control point. Cross-boundary private cars are expected to take a longer time to pass through the control point. 

Motorists are advised to pay extra attention to the traffic management measures to be implemented by the Police on the approaches to the control point. They are also advised to be patient in case of traffic congestion, and follow the instructions of the Police.
2025-09-25T20:00:00.CONTENT_CN:
駕駛人士請注意，在2025年9月28及29日的凌晨時段經落馬洲管制站往來內地的跨境私家車或會增加。視乎現場交通情況，通往落馬洲管制站的道路在有關時段或會實施特別交通安排，以便所有過境及非過境的公共客運服務車輛（包括跨境巴士及皇巴）能暢順地進入上述管制站。跨境私家車輪候通過口岸的時間預計會較長。

駕駛人士請特別留意警方在通往管制站的道路上實施的交通管理措施，如遇交通受阻，請保持忍讓及遵從警務人員的指示。
